synopsis.text:
Kozuki Oden, a legendary samurai and daimyo of Wano, embarks on a journey that leads him to cross paths with the Pirate King, Gol D. Roger, and the Emperor of the Seas, Edward "Whitebeard" Newgate. In this recap episode of "One Piece," Oden's son, Momonosuke, and the rebellious Yamato, who defies his own father, Kaidou, delve into the heroic tales of Oden's past.

As Momonosuke and Yamato explore the adventures and hardships faced by Oden, they learn about the joy, pain, and personal growth that shaped the man he became. From his youth to his final moments, Oden's life story unfolds, revealing the legacy of the Kozuki clan that once ruled the Land of Wano. Join Momonosuke and Yamato as they uncover the inspiring journey of a legendary samurai and the indomitable spirit of the Kozuki clan.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
